text: Assuredly your Lord is ever watchful.This means: the path of every person leads to Him. He will then reward them for their deeds and they will either be saved or otherwise. And He [elsewhere] says that He will position a patrol (raṣad) of angels with ⸢hooks (kalālīb) and⸣ pikes (ḥasak) on the Traverse over Hell (jisr jahannam), who will question people concerning the religious obligations (farāʾiḍ).
